Articles.Content:
1) Is there a way to permanently disable the temperature display? when ever I switch between ships or launch a new ship I always forget to disable it and CTD.

2) Is there away to mod specific contracts to come later in career? I think its really weird that tourists want to land on eve after duna and I would rather take tourists anywhere considering that eve land and return is the hardest thing in ksp.

1. Not in stock. Perhaps a mod could do this, though I don't happen to know of one that does.

2. I suppose it would be possible to have a mod that does this (certainly contracts are moddable), though I don't know of one that specifically does this.

1. You can probably find something in the FX folder, but good luck with that.

2. Totally don't know about this, but you can probably look into the contracts.cfg and edit the chance settings. I'm not sure exactly sure what this generator is tailored to [appearing or which], but it's worth a shot.

1, if you disable PPFX in your graphic settings the temperature guages do not cause a CTD.

2, you may want to look at `rejector`, a mod for automatically denying/accepting contracts by keyword for example `tourist`
